main.name: Morenikeji Ajisegiri
main.description: I am a skilled, innovative, and motivated Frontend Developer with years of proven expertise in applying modern technologies such as HTML/CSS, React, Redux, Webflow and S.E.O, as well as utilizing best practices to improve organizational effectiveness and maximize productivity.
main.bio: An innovative and inventive frontend engineer skilled in open-source web development technologies, including HTML5, CSS3/SCSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux/Context API, Webflow, and more. Experience in developing, maintaining functional dynamic visually appealing websites and applications for a variety of industries and organizations.
